Package com.aionemu.commons.network

Interface Summary
ConnectionFactory This interface defines a factory for connection implementations.
DisconnectionThreadPool DisconnectionThreadPool that will be used to execute DisconnectionTask
 

Class Summary
AcceptDispatcherImpl This is implementation of Dispatcher that may only accept connections.
Acceptor This class represents an Acceptor that will accept sockets
connections dispatched by Accept Dispatcher.
AcceptReadWriteDispatcherImpl This is implementation of Dispatcher that may accept connections, read and write data.
AConnection Class that represent Connection with server socket.
DisconnectionTask Disconnection Task that will be execute on DisconnectionThreadPool
Dispatcher Dispatcher that dispatch SelectionKeys set selected by Selector.
IPRange Utility class that is designed to check belongings of one address to the range.
NioServer NioServer instance that handle connections on specified addresses.
PacketProcessor<T extends AConnection> Packet Processor responsible for executing packets in correct order with respecting rules: - 1 packet / client at one time. - execute packets in received order.
ServerCfg This class represents ServerCfg for configuring NioServer
